extendedInfo.description: This is a paint bucket coloring app for kids! You can color 20 drawings from the coloring book. Every color can be chosen (see screenshot 3) and all drawings can be saved to sd-card! Very entertaining for children, it keeps them busy and it is fun to colour! Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablets! High Definition (HD) images available! It also has a very small download size of 533 kb!
